title: Targeted Partner Outbound
summary: Built a partner-sourced pipeline program for a B2B client. Clean targeting, operator-led intros, and short cycles. Generated real conversations inside 30 days.

title: Hiring Clarity with Role Simulations
summary: Designed lightweight, job-real simulations to evaluate candidates earlier. Reduced interview loops and increased confidence in shortlists.

title: Practical AI for Research Ops
summary: Automations that turn messy market inputs into clean briefings. Saves hours and keeps teams aligned on what matters.
